settings.heading: About Us
settings.para:
Amanté is an international intimate wear brand, offering comfort, fashion, and sensuality to the modern South Asian woman. 5 words which describe the amanté woman, and the philosophies embedded in each of our designs are: Spirited. Sensual. Sophisticated. Stylish. Self-assured.

Our products are made for the ever evolving modern woman of today who just like fashion, is an ever-evolving canvas. Her tastes, roles, goals, ambitions and even her body are in a constant state of evolution. We at amanté, understand and embrace these changes. And the same evolution acts as our inspiration to constantly innovate by creating products that are designed to give women freedom and flexibility with their lingerie. Whether it’s lingerie for everyday use or a special occasion, active wear for the gym, swimsuits to splash around in water, or lounge wear for lazy days, amanté has it all.
